title: The Christians portion Wherein is unfolded the unsearchable riches he hath by his interest in Christ. Whom injoying hee possesseth all things else. By R. Sibbs D.D. and preacher to the honorable society of Grayes-Inne, and master of Catherine Hall in Cambridge. Published by T.G. and P.N.
author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
publisher: Printed by John Norton for John Rothvvell, and are to be sold at the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard,
